name: Scootelivery
description:
You are a minimum wage food deliverer. To make things worse your scooter has random amount of power per turn and scooter hating grandmas are out to get you.

Kill ALL the grandmas and get to the finish before the food gets cold!

This game was brought to you by 4 unique and precious individuals. The game was made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam.
